text: Mayor Adam West is a character for the television comedy Family Guy. He is voiced and based on the actor Adam West. He first appeared as the crazy mayor of Quahog, Rhode Island in Fifteen Minutes of Shame. He usually never takes things seriously and only cares about his office. He is married to Carol West, Lois Griffin's sister. The fate of the character is currently unknown following Adam West's death in June 2017. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2000 Category:Family Guy characters Category:Animated human characters
title: Mayor West
